ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Tank question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. I think in that case you have to see who can keep aggro better and who is easiest to keep maintained. You don t want a tank that drains the cleric s mana
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. I think in that case you have to see who can keep aggro better and who is easiest to keep maintained. You don't want a tank that drains the cleric's mana too much. Plus you want someone who can keep constant aggro.
luv,
-Su

======== At 2004-10-24, 13:34:00 you wrote: ========

Hail all!

I've got a question for you all..say your the group leader and you have 2
tanks. You compare them to see who is going to be the Main Tank and one
tank has more hit points than the other, but the other has more AC. Who do
you choose to be the Main Tank, the guy with more hit points, or AC?

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Caelitus> Ayonae Ro
Shadowkight of the 54th Suffering
